data.text:
Ecuador's @mfespinosaEC will be the 4th woman #UNGA President - and the 1st woman from Latin America to hold the position. Watch to find out more ⬇️
https://t.co/8QnAdrAHG5 https://t.co/LP26RY94mA
Meet the Korean women (some in their 80s) who gather shellfish for a living while helping #SaveOurOcean — and holding their breath for up to 3 mins! #GlobalGoals https://t.co/jdADh37LUU
Apply for the 2018 UN training for Palestinian journalists here ➡️ https://t.co/pffU2d5AV1. Deadline is 18 June. #PalJournos https://t.co/0bGbqjih39

🖍️ Crayons + 📜 paper + ⚡ creativity.
Calling on kids to draw for human rights. 📣 Parents, siblings, teachers: spread the word. Learn more & submit drawings by 31 Oct: https://t.co/6ymyQc0tVR https://t.co/abT91vrOSX

“Women need support from each other to cope with this crisis” -- Rohingya refugee Noor helps women newly arriving in Bangladesh as part of a @UN_Women supported programme: https://t.co/JHXp7sqYiE https://t.co/2nKoxPrcRg
Check out our latest @instagram story to see how we celebrated Friday's #WorldOceansDay in NYC ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU #SaveOurOcean https://t.co/6BvPv9Bl07

News this week:

🇧🇪 @BelgiumUN
🇩🇪 @GermanyUN
🇮🇩 @indonesiaunny
🇩🇴 @RDMISIONONU
🇿🇦 @SAMissionNY 

#UNGA elected these 5 countries as non-permanent members of the Security Council for 2-year terms. https://t.co/f9BxJ8EdKz
Now blooming in the ever-growing Rose Garden at UNHQ in NYC: 1500+ 🌹🌹, including the 1946 Peace Rose. Info on UN tours here: https://t.co/kRY5hpoXqM https://t.co/tTY1AspErp

🌊 New "Clean our Ocean" exhibit at UNHQ showcases the 🗝️ role ocean ecosystems play for all life on 🌎 & the urgent need to protect them. Details ➡️ https://t.co/CBTr2RtldL #WorldOceansDay https://t.co/ZQyC9hetPm

Starting soon: the world’s 1st ever #TEDx event from a refugee camp! 
Watch live for stories that uplift & inspire the entire 🌎: https://t.co/HQtRPpmO6j #TEDxKakumaCamp https://t.co/Zj2R6trvZb

👏 Thank you to our UN colleagues in NYC who cleaned up a portion of the East River shoreline on Friday's #WorldOceansDay. 💡 Get ideas for how YOU can help #SaveOurOcean 👉https://t.co/jMGqlk9ZLV https://t.co/SWmPEabKae
Investment in treatment for mental health disorders is good for people and good for economies. ⬇️ https://t.co/fWL2Zr95m2

🇧🇪 @BelgiumUN
🇩🇪 @GermanyUN
🇮🇩 @indonesiaunny
🇩🇴 @RDMISIONONU
🇿🇦 @SAMissionNY 

#UNGA elected these 5 countries as non-permanent members of the Security Council for 2-year terms. https://t.co/8dGJfGZh1Q https://t.co/TsHlIyYuvc

#FBF to last year when a 🐳, a 🐟 & a seahorse made from trash welcomed participants to the Ocean Conference where 193 countries adopted a Call for Action to #SaveOurOcean, https://t.co/4WidMIPOaK #WorldOceansDay https://t.co/w0Qw2d6iDG

On this #WorldOceansDay, I urge governments, communities & individuals to celebrate our oceans by helping clear them of pollution & ensure they remain vibrant for generations to come. -- @antonioguterres: https://t.co/9dzyY39DTP https://t.co/Zg5QCpbUXK
#UNGA elects @BelgiumUN, @GermanyUN, @indonesiaunny, @RDMISIONONU and @SAMissionNY as Security Council non-permanent members for 2-year terms. https://t.co/svznemQth6 https://t.co/I5hj4mMcFq
Starting now: #UNGA elects 5 non-permanent members of Security Council for 2-year terms. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf

United States: the use of immigration detention & family separation as a deterrent runs counter to human rights standards & principles. The child’s best interest should always come first. --@UNHumanRights https://t.co/qnJh0Xu3F3

Refuse plastic 🍴 
Use refillable 💧bottles 
Bring your own 🛒 bags

These are just 3 tips on how to #BeatPlasticPollution & #SaveOurOcean on Friday's #WorldOceansDay and every day: https://t.co/jMGqljSoUn https://t.co/SvV5h6kQiE
.@UNICEF is calling on governments & companies to give dads, and all parents, the time & support they need to nurture their babies. https://t.co/2u96SdQbMj
On Friday's #WorldOceansDay & every day, take action to #SaveOurOcean because our ocean is our future ➡️ https://t.co/ds6BdySzkV https://t.co/UiNde1QP7n
UN expert @tojeaquintana calls on Democratic People’s Republic of Korea to release political prisoners ahead of denuclearization talks with the U.S. https://t.co/w3fyb6R4ii

#TBT to 2016 when #Path2Equality crosswalk led global leaders to #UNGA event on #LGBTI equality. This #PrideMonth join UN @free_equal in the fight against transphobia & homophobia: https://t.co/Ljui9G92Ag https://t.co/NiRENx12xh

Human trafficking is a crime that knows no borders. With training, employees in the airline industry ✈ can play 🔑 role in spotting suspicious behaviour & helping to #EndHumanTrafficking. https://t.co/jRfwR1EA1K via @UNODC https://t.co/Ih4eDrr28e

There is sufficient fresh water 💦 on the planet for everyone, yet water scarcity affects more than 40% of the 🌍 population. See how the #GlobalGoals aim to bring safe water to all: https://t.co/6DwQJO89wR https://t.co/1USAkBnxJM

Understanding reached on creating conditions that would allow hundreds of thousands of Rohingya refugees to voluntarily and safely return to their homes. Info here: https://t.co/4Ar1lBz4Fu https://t.co/ustwEu0eJY
📉 Global foreign direct investment flows fell by 23% in 2017, according to new @UNCTAD World Investment Report 2018: https://t.co/sIuyDx2bUg https://t.co/nZcfzCikpq
⚡️On this week's #WorldEnvironmentDay, people from around the 🌍 came together to #BeatPlasticPollution. Have a look at some inspiring ideas in this @twitter moment! https://t.co/qH0uRqRFyN
.@AminaJMohammed shared a meal #WithRefugees during this month of Ramadan. Share your 🥘 via @ShareTheMealorg ➡️ https://t.co/CoeTOEKIX0 https://t.co/YF1aJrh5yf
Properly managed, migration stands to benefit all. Get details on the Global Compact for Migration here: https://t.co/nxWjd99khA https://t.co/nJkCvptcVc
Throwback to 1968 when US Senator Robert Kennedy, who died 50 years ago today, met with Secretary-General U Thant at UNHQ, along Jacqueline Kennedy. #RFK50 https://t.co/qPqz6ITa3z
Find out more about the journey of #endFGM activist & survivor Jaha Dukureh ➡️ https://t.co/rZ8dU1lIcg https://t.co/DIsKFCoCvW

Did you know that 500+ people have flown in space, but only 59 have been women?

Follow @UNOOSA for daily space facts counting down to #UNISPACE50 celebration later this month. https://t.co/JWljKovVdD #GlobalGoals https://t.co/zBRzu8aI1Q

Wednesday is Russian Language Day!
Follow @UnitedNationsRU to see our social media updates in Russian 👇 https://t.co/K0OHs5VCrB

.@UNYouthEnvoy is in Brussels for European Development Days to focus attention on #GlobalGoals & support #SpotlightENDViolence against women & girls ♀️ https://t.co/bn9RXuyJxF #EDD18 https://t.co/Da6qrmHT2A

Clean water & sanitation 🚰
Affordable & clean energy ⚡
Sustainable cities 🏙️
Responsible consumption & production 🛒
Life on land 🐌 🌳

These #GlobalGoals are the focus of the #STIForum at UNHQ in NYC. Details: https://t.co/qUFImzrns5

Depression can happen to anybody. It is an illness, not a character weakness -- and it can be treated. 

Info from @WHO here: https://t.co/jXzUdQkd5j https://t.co/AYHuoR6fcp
From bottle dresses to solar cars, on Tuesday's #WorldEnvironmentDay, a Green Fair at UNHQ showcased innovative ideas to support #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/K0aDMQXinD https://t.co/TRC4ypgLBC

Refuse plastic 🍴 
Use refillable 💧bottles 
Bring your own 🛒 bags

💡 More tips on how to #BeatPlasticPollution from @UNEnvironment on Tuesday's #WorldEnvironmentDay: https://t.co/57ekSJ4LIT https://t.co/S7GbUUII9b

Full results: 
192 ballots
2 abstentions
128 votes for @mfespinosaEC; 96 votes required to be elected @UN_PGA. https://t.co/K7WJoX03m8

What is @antonioguterres doing to #BeatPlasticPollution?
What are UN colleagues doing?
What can you do?

Find out in our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU #WorldEnvironmentDay https://t.co/2Ha50JxIf9
Ecuador's @mfespinosaEC elected @UN_PGA for #UNGA 73rd session. https://t.co/8XcyyjlUNO https://t.co/MNYZlS6Frw
Illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing poses a serious threat to the health of our oceans. More info on Tuesday's int'l day against this practice: https://t.co/0vbIkMfDf0 https://t.co/ebPJxnQjn1

“Environmental protection can & must be part of any economic planning."

-- UN Chief Economist shares his vision for a sustainable future in this interview with @UNDESA: https://t.co/BYlKKLfTMh
On Tuesday's Int'l Day for the Fight against Illegal, Unreported & Unregulated Fishing 🎣, see how @FAO is working to save our oceans: https://t.co/A0y1y3CPGJ https://t.co/FxF8zdMoK8

On Tuesday's #WorldEnvironmentDay, join the global game of Tag to #BeatPlasticPollution - show how you're making the switch from single-use plastic & challenge 3 friends to do the same: https://t.co/lbuv9HH9pT https://t.co/RFLpBL9AUS

Tuesday is the 1st-ever Int'l Day for the Fight against Illegal, Unreported & Unregulated Fishing, a practice that undermines global efforts to conserve & manage fish stocks. 🐟 More info: https://t.co/m8lxOF97pV https://t.co/I9VuvmflRr

Steps to #EndTB include:

Reduce poverty & inequality
Increase universal health coverage
Combat anti-microbial resistance

Civil society, academics & private sector were at #UNGA on Monday https://t.co/GIkBHjVuOl

If you can't reuse it, refuse it!

On Tuesday's #WorldEnvironmentDay, join the global movement to #BeatPlasticPollution: https://t.co/9s1DiMWKHQ https://t.co/xWIOkhYTUJ

UN Peacekeepers are risking their lives to protect others. 

Last week, we thanked the men & women who are #ServingForPeace with a medal parade at UNHQ. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/VXl80SN8ZE
Find out more about the Technology Bank for Least Developed Countries, which was inaugurated in Turkey on Monday, here 👉 https://t.co/rctqXc6PYg https://t.co/i0XLT5DrBs

Puerto Rico: 8 months after Hurricane Maria, @unicefusa remains on the ground, helping to rebuild homes, implement nutrition programs & provide psycho-social support. Here's how you can help: https://t.co/Pf8MgUrngk https://t.co/pmyuU7ZRwJ
How can science, technology & innovation help achieve the #GlobalGoals? #STIForum starts on Tuesday at UNHQ. Details: https://t.co/qUFImz9MAx https://t.co/Qz9VjPHOkK

Continues this week in @UNGeneva: International Labour Conference –
Building a future with decent work [through 8 June]. @ILO info: https://t.co/PdL1EV8Apz https://t.co/sHu9oHYTtT
See how @UNICEF is helping #ChildrenUnderAttack on Monday's Int'l Day of Innocent Children Victims of Aggression: https://t.co/KuR4R08IfO https://t.co/d4JWNMns6x
What's happening this week at the UN? #WorldEnviromentDay, #WorldOceansDay, @UN_PGA election  & more. List of events here: https://t.co/QYEmO5RFOd https://t.co/wFPe7OmUUr

Children need peace & protection. 
Monday's Int'l Day of Innocent Children Victims of Aggression affirms the UN's commitment to children's rights: https://t.co/jiYTzwb5EX https://t.co/UFR6trnf59
#TEDxKakumaCamp - the world’s first TED event in a refugee camp - will happen on 9 June in Kenya. Here’s how to join: https://t.co/x8yl1d0JNc https://t.co/ksunWJag7U
Over 1M women & men have been #ServingForPeace around the 🌍 since 1948. @antonioguterres was in Mali this week to mark UN Peacekeepers Day https://t.co/CKAq7KmPqV https://t.co/Qh45dvxRUq

☔️ or ☀️, we are celebrating Sunday's 1st ever #WorldBicycleDay. The 🚲 is an affordable, clean & environmentally friendly means of transportation. More advantages of bikes ➡️ https://t.co/uL1jdLPovT https://t.co/XQDb96NNbn

Announced this week: “the most ambitious & comprehensive transformation of the UN development system in decades” -- @AntonioGuterres & @AminaJMohammed explain what that means. 

More info: https://t.co/epsh8IJoIl 

 https://t.co/NyX1V6fRU9

⛺️ Shelter
🍚 Food
💧 Water
🚑 Healthcare

Find out what else the UN is doing for people in Syria: https://t.co/mmAW4zIIef

"When I was in Iraq, I saw a lot of things that children just shouldn’t see."
--Singer @emmanuelktwiter shared his story this week at UNHQ's #Youth72 Dialogue https://t.co/eUwvNYT7mC https://t.co/qTQ6u06PCh
🚵‍♀️🚴‍♂️🚴‍♀️🚵‍♂️ Sunday is the first-ever #WorldBicycleDay. Bicycles can help achieve the #GlobalGoals. Here is how: ➡️ https://t.co/uL1jdM6Znr via @UNDP https://t.co/SzVAytK1FM
Hear sexist language? Call it out! Here are more ways you can help achieve gender equality: https://t.co/hXdPIZpvAc #GlobalGoals https://t.co/SBmO2iLzS6

🚲 = clean means of transportation
🚲 = tool for development 
🚲 = access to education, health care & sport

More about how bicycles benefit people & 🌎 on Sunday's 1st-ever #WorldBicycleDay: https://t.co/uL1jdLPovT https://t.co/ChVkkqWFmh

Peacekeeping remains a defining activity for the UN & one of the strongest expressions of international solidarity & multilateralism -- @antonioguterres 

We celebrated men & women #ServingForPeace with a medal parade at UNHQ this week. https://t.co/UFnSL7NOar

From heart to hand: one cartoonist's profound journey examining the impact of his father’s trauma surviving the Nazi death camp at Auschwitz. 🎧 ⬇️

https://t.co/twMagaCbHc
Everyone can play a part in a better future for our planet. Thanks @ElyxYak for helping to #BeatPlasticPollution! https://t.co/HBEc91zhYw #WorldEnvironmentDay https://t.co/VQ8WYjhYqx

View of UN Headquarters this week during #Manhattanhenge 🌇
Our HQ is in NYC but the UN's work touches lives all over the 🌏. Here's how: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj. Image via @UN_Photo https://t.co/rMSjvJS7zP
Training young African leaders can take societies to great heights. @AfricaRenewal explains: https://t.co/uBI2BuOt74 https://t.co/HoMfV4254W

This week @UNPeacekeeping turned 70! Have a look at #PK70 birthday wishes from around the 🌍 in this @twitter moment.

https://t.co/5uU99Ft6vp

While risk of famine in Somalia has declined, over 5M people are still in need of humanitarian assistance. Info from @UNmigration, including how you can help, here: https://t.co/wDotAMRp36 https://t.co/332v4KThYo

"UN Peacekeeping: 70 Years of Service & Sacrifice" -- Exhibit at UNHQ celebrates 1M+ men & women who have been #ServingForPeace since 1948. Details ➡️ https://t.co/CBTr2RtldL #PK70 https://t.co/hdJIqPM3KC
People living in conflict-stricken areas make up more than half of the world’s 815M chronically hungry. Here's how @WFP provides life-saving help: https://t.co/HayQGJ3Dhx https://t.co/BhzDJUbSv4
https://t.co/PvPiHFqWfI
https://t.co/4Pgnnk1Nym
https://t.co/BEkKVfUELC

These peacekeepers gave their lives to protect others. We are forever in their debt & they are always in our hearts. 

-- @antonioguterres about the 3,700 peacekeepers who have died #ServingForPeace since 1948 https://t.co/6fAhjOf3ak https://t.co/yViIpe5yvs
Friday's #ParentsDay is an opportunity to show your appreciation for parents and all they do. https://t.co/xDeddl5ozu
Friday: @RussiaUN takes on rotating Security Council presidency for the month of June: https://t.co/UdbHVcOiLW https://t.co/4slSOfLkjf
Friday's Global Day of Parents acknowledges all parents for their selfless commitment to children: https://t.co/cfjm604Oy6 https://t.co/H02B9qj8zY
#FBF to October 2017 when the 3 most recent Secretaries-General met at UNHQ in NYC: @KofiAnnan, @antonioguterres & Ban Ki-moon. https://t.co/Cvlm2e0G56 https://t.co/ruSMIhhkK1
How are parents key to achieving the #GlobalGoals? Find out on Friday's #ParentsDay: https://t.co/cfjm604Oy6 https://t.co/khNsBcHDiR

"These reforms place sustainable development at the heart of the United Nations." -- @antonioguterres on UN development system reform. 
Full remarks: https://t.co/4ztx31ni6w #GlobalGoals https://t.co/OhSTRP5NxT

The resolution adopted today ushers in the most ambitious & comprehensive transformation of the UN development system in decades - @antonioguterres 
Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf #GlobalGoals https://t.co/HW3H72sLxW
Most people know tobacco causes cancer, but many aren’t aware that it also causes heart disease & stroke. Latest @who report explains: https://t.co/5xxcC1xkpA #NoTobacco https://t.co/q1j7HVxh5L
Check out our latest @instagram story to go behind-the-scenes with @antonioguterres on his 2nd day in Mali ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/Jfgj2NtyYE
Tobacco kills over 7 M people each year, despite the steady reduction in its use globally. Key facts from @WHO here: #NoTobacco: https://t.co/9OnWpGMoHS https://t.co/8lDHkjANJt

There are still 17 non-self-governing territories in the world. 
More on these places and their people here: https://t.co/1CWsDqxyL9 https://t.co/Oejk4Bu3TX

Tobacco kills up to half of its users.
Reducing tobacco use promotes global health & boosts development. 
Thursday is World #NoTobacco Day: https://t.co/JDjsNCvEdC #GlobalGoals https://t.co/kevf7RZHk3

Tobacco causes over 2M deaths from cardiovascular diseases every year.
On Thursday's World #NoTobacco Day & every day, choose health! https://t.co/JDjsNCNfCc https://t.co/sKPRcCpErb

Young people from around the 🌍 shared ideas on education, employment & prevention of radicalization at Wednesday’s #Youth72 Dialogue. Olympian @pitaTofua was one of them ⬇️ https://t.co/eUwvNYT7mC https://t.co/RvJXgAbPzn

"Ramadan is a season of peace & reflection. In solidarity with Muslims all around the world, today I join those observing the fast here in Mali."
@antonioguterres visited Grand Mosque & met local people in Mopti, Mali. https://t.co/qxlVJyRAaH https://t.co/gK5f6qjC7A
Take part in Wednesday’s Youth Dialogue at UNHQ using #Youth72 & watch live at https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf ⬇️ https://t.co/5jtHmIDH13
Separating children from their families leaves them more vulnerable to exploitation and abuse. Regardless of immigration status, children are children first. https://t.co/MsK6FK1FkE

See our @Instagram story for a behind-the-scenes look at how @antonioguterres spent UN Peacekeepers' Day in Mali to honour brave men & women #ServingForPeace: https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU #PK70 https://t.co/wZXjvl3JYn
See highlights of the the International Labour Conference here: https://t.co/FuOzPkpk9p https://t.co/joutGIdEJr

At the UN countries agreed to a global Call for Action to reduce marine pollution & that's 1 way we are helping to #BeatPlasticPollution: https://t.co/fKemadbTnF

What actions are you taking @UNYouthEnvoy, @GlobalGoalsUN & @refugees? cc @UNEnvironment https://t.co/DdWNJGDjvd

“As peacekeepers, you are the foremost symbol of the United Nations itself.”
--@antonioguterres on Tuesday's Peacekeepers' Day. Find out more about his visit to Mali, where he honoured women & men #ServingForPeace:  https://t.co/3sCvbTCon7 https://t.co/pPhdHoQ48S
